Ah, I think I might see what the issue is.

If you start a new "HTML Application with TypeScript" project, does compile-on-save work for you? If so, it might be that your MVC4 project does not have (or doesn't have an up-to-date) support for compiling TypeScript. If so, you'll need to add it to your specific project, and you can get the parts you need from that default template.
